hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas bin Sirin said:"I heard Anas bin Malik say: 'The Shaitan disputed with Nuh, peace be upon him, concerning the grapevine. One said: "This is for me," and the other said: "This is for me." Then they agreed that Nuh would have one-third and the Shaitan would have two-thirds

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ مَا يَجُوزُ شُرْبُهُ مِنَ الطِّلاَءِ وَمَا لاَ يَجُوزُ
chapter.eng-name: What Kind of Thickened Grape Juice is Permissible to Drink and What Kind is Not Permitte
